testcase.classname: US_002 System should not allow anyone to register with invalid credentials
testcase.name: TC_012 email id cannot be created without "@" sign and "." extensions
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to "GmiBank_url" Homepage...................................passed And User clicks the "Register" from dropdown menu...........................passed And User enter "invalid_email1" to email text box...........................passed And User preses Tab key.....................................................passed Then User sees invalid email message "invalid_email_message"................passed
